com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage

Interface IDAuthority

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIDManager, ConsistentKeyIDManager, TransactionalIDManager

    public interface IDAuthority
    Handles the unique allocation of ids. Returns blocks of ids that are uniquely allocated to the caller so that they can be used to uniquely identify elements. *
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the IDAuthority and any underlying storage backend.

    • Method Detail

      • getIDBlock

        long[] getIDBlock(int partition)
                  throws StorageException
        Returns an array that specifies a block of new ids, i.e. the ids between return[0] (inclusive) and return[1] (exclusive). It is guaranteed that the block of ids for the particular partition id is uniquely assigned, that is, the block of ids has not been previously and will not subsequently be assigned again when invoking this method on the local or any remote machine that is connected to the underlying storage backend.

        In other words, this method has to ensure that ids are uniquely assigned per partition.

        Parameters:
        partition - Partition for which to request an id block. Must be bigger or equal to 0
        Returns:
        a range of ids for the particular partition
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • getLocalIDPartition

        StaticBuffer[] getLocalIDPartition()
                                   throws StorageException
        Returns the lower and upper limits of the key range assigned to this local machine as an array with two entries.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • setIDBlockSizer

        void setIDBlockSizer(IDBlockSizer sizer)
        Sets the IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority. The IDBlockSizer specifies the block size for each partition guaranteeing that the same partition will always be assigned the same block size.

        The IDBlockSizer cannot be changed for an IDAuthority that has already been used (i.e. after invoking getIDBlock(int).

        Parameters:
        sizer - The IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority

      • close

        void close()
           throws StorageException
        Closes the IDAuthority and any underlying storage backend.
        Throws:
        StorageException
